metadata.name: How's the Serenity
metadata.description:
We all have dark thoughts that cloud our minds,  
and a moment of serenity is what we all seek.

Sharing a moment with the one you love, ensures the future will not be so bleak.

We all live in a fast-paced world,  
where distractions are on the rise.

What helps is to find a peaceful place,  
where we can find ourselves and harmonize.

An open sky filled with wonder,  
or a water body that brings the peace.

Seek it and you will find it,  
and let your worries be at ease.

Artist: DracheTech11

Collection: Serenity Now

Edition: 1/1

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries, and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as the creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with creator.
